English: Two days later
Next day, the Volga base
Ah, comrade Shaposhnikov and comrade Lemontov. Let me congratulate you both on your successful offensive.\nI've heard it was a crushing victory.
We've won the battle but the war is far from over. Why did you call us here, Zubarev?
There is someone who wants to talk to you... personally...
Comrade Vladimir Volkov, Army General... Welcome to Kolguyev!
At ease, comrades. I come from the mainland. I've heard quite disturbing news of our performance in this archipelago...
Everon fiasco.. and now half of Kolguyev is in enemy hands... Soviet soil, comrades! We are losing Soviet soil here.

I don't want to hear excuses. The enemy is much stronger than anticipated so I arranged for reinforcements to support your war effort.\nThey'll be here in a few days. I want NATO out of this island by the end of December!
Yes, comrade Volkov. We've already begun with that.\nJust yesterday we undertook a major offensive and took back Malsk.\nThe enemy suffered heavy losses!
I know, comrade Zubarev. I have heard as much. although you failed to mention it was comrade Lemontov leading the offensive.
Well, yes... we all work together here on a master strategy...
Stop bullshitting me, comrade.\nYou are a good politician but as an officer you suck ass. But that's why we have comrades such as Shaposhnikov and Lemontov.
Comrade, I...
We'll talk of this later, don't worry. I have an urgent meeting in Berlin and will have to leave you early.\nI need this matter to be resolved as quickly and efficiently as possible.
That's why comrade Lemontov will from now on be the commander-in-chief of Kolguyev forces.\nYour mission is simple: kick the enemy out of here.\nThink you can do that, comrade?
You can count on me, comrade Volkov.
Excellent, Now, comrade Zubarev, let's discuss our matters. You comrades can return to your duties. Dismissed.
He gave you the command? I can't say I was expecting that!
Me neither. Expected a lot of other things, but Zubarev was his favorite animal around here.\nThis is an interesting development.
What are you going to do now then, commander-in-chief?
I have to defeat NATO forces of course. And I'm gonna have to plan for the future...
Hi, comrade, I am expected by comrade Lemontov.
Right this way.
Is that Rashiv?
Of course it is. Come.
Comrade, you wanted to see me?
Yes. I'm gonna make this quick and simple. From now on everyone should address you as lieutenant.\nYou'll get a new tent close to mine, a new uniform and your own squad.
Mission orders will come soon. Any questions?
Eh... Just one. Why me?
I think we experienced a lot together for you to even ask, but I'll answer anyway.\nYour father was a good man, a brave and smart soldier and you inherited his best traits and added your own.
I want you in my commanding centre, plain and simple.
Congratulations, Sergey.
That's everything that should be said in public. We'll speak again later more privately. I'm counting on you, Sergey.
Stas, show him the ropes. Sergey, come later for briefing. Dismissed!
LEONID TO BAZA, WE'RE MOVING OUT TO PICK UP REST OF THE SQUAD. THEN MOVE ON TO FIND THE ENEMY RAIDING CAMP. OVER.
WE HEAR YOU, LEONID. GOOD LUCK ON YOUR MISSION, COMRADE LIEUTENANT RASHIV. BAZA OUT.
WE ARE AWAITING YOUR ORDERS, COMRADE LIEUTENANT!
GET IN LINE, COMRADES. WE HAVE WORK TO DO.
BORIS TO ANYONE IN CLOSE PROXIMITY, WE WERE AMBUSHED AT THE CROSSROADS AT GJ32, WE REQUIRE AN ASSISTANCE IMMEDIATELY. OVER!
LEONID TO BORIS, WE ARE CLOSE. WE ARE ON OUR WAY. OUT.
THANKS FOR YOUR HELP, LEONID. THOSE BASTARDS DID A NUMBER ON US.
RETREAT TO THE PORT AND WAIT FOR ANOTHER TRANSPORT. WE'LL CLEAR THEM OUT OF HERE, DON'T WORRY.
IT SEEMS THEY CAME FROM THE WEST...
LEONID TO BAZA, WE'VE DISCOVERED AN ENEMY CAMP AT GF34. ENGAGING. OUT.
LEONID TO BAZA, WE'VE DESTROYED THE ENEMY CAMP AT GF34. OUT.
LEONID TO BAZA, WE'VE DISCOVERED AN ENEMY CAMP AT GD31. ENGAGING. OUT.
LEONID TO BAZA, WE'VE DESTROYED THE ENEMY CAMP AT GD31. OUT.
BAZA TO LEONID, GOOD WORK. YOU'VE CLEARED OUT THE WESTERN FORESTS. NOW YOU ONLY NEED TO FIND THE MAIN CAMP. GOOD LUCK. BAZA OUT.
LEONID TO BAZA, WE'VE FOUND THE MAIN ENEMY ENCAMPMENT. WE'RE ENGAGING NOW. OUT.
LEONID TO BAZA, THE MAIN CAMP IS DESTROYED. OUR OBJECTIVE IS COMPLETED. OVER.
BAZA TO LEONID, NICE WORK. VERY CLEAN, COMRADE RASHIV. REPORT BACK TO BASE. BAZA OUT.
BAZA TO LEONID, GOOD WORK. REPORT BACK TO BASE IF YOU WISH TO END THE MISSION OR LOOK FOR THE OTHER CAMPS. BAZA OUT.
WE'VE DONE ENOUGH FOR TODAY. WE'RE HEADING BACK. OUT.
LEONID TO BAZA, WE'VE LOST A LOT OF MEN. CAN WE GET ANY REINFORCEMENS? OVER.
BAZA TO LEONID, GET TO MENSHIY ROY, SOME MEN FROM THERE WILL JOIN YOU. WE DON'T HAVE ANY MORE TO SPARE THOUGH, SO BE CAREFUL. BAZA OUT.
Ambushed Squad
Pick up your Squad

Eastern Front

Checkpoint
PICK UP YOUR SWUAD
FIND THE ENEMY RAIDING CAMP
DESTROY THE CAMP
